title: v1.6.3.7-v9 Issues #2 and #10
details:
Version 1.6.3.7-v9 implements two critical fixes:

**Issue #2: Unified MESSAGE_RECEIVED Logging**
- All three message paths (PORT, BC, RUNTIME) now use consistent `MESSAGE_RECEIVED [PATH] [TYPE]:` format
- Added `MESSAGE_PROCESSED [PATH] [TYPE]:` exit logging with duration tracking
- Correlation IDs generated for messages without one (format: `{path}-{timestamp}-{random}`)
- Entry time tracking added to: `handlePortMessage()`, `handleBroadcastChannelMessage()`, `_processRuntimeMessage()`

**Issue #10: Tab Affinity Map Cleanup (quickTabHostInfo)**
- Constants: `HOST_INFO_TTL_MS` (24h), `HOST_INFO_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS` (60s)
- Cleanup functions: `_cleanupStaleHostInfoEntries()`, `_getHostInfoAgeStats()`, `_logHostInfoDiagnostics()`, `_runHostInfoCleanupJob()`
- Browser tab listener: `_handleBrowserTabRemoved()`, `_initBrowserTabsOnRemovedListener()`, `_cleanupHostInfoForClosedTab()`
- Interval management: `_startHostInfoCleanupInterval()`, `_stopHostInfoCleanupInterval()`, `hostInfoCleanupIntervalId`

Key patterns:
- Use `continue` instead of nested `if` to avoid max-depth ESLint errors
- Use consistent null checks: `!entry || !entry.lastUpdate`
- Log format: `[Manager] [HOST_INFO_CLEANUP]` or `[Manager] [HOST_INFO_DIAGNOSTICS]`
